20th Anniversary

Celebrate Life’s Special Moments
Looking for a unique venue to host your next special event?
At Eagle Creek Golf Club, we believe life is full of beautiful milestones—and they deserve to be celebrated in a place as special as the occasion itself. Nestled in the heart of Lake Nona, our stunning venue blends classic charm with modern elegance, creating the perfect backdrop for your most memorable moments.
Whether you’re planning a joyful
baby shower
, a lively
birthday bash
, a romantic
anniversary celebration
, or a heartwarming
family reunion
, Eagle Creek offers a versatile and welcoming space to bring your vision to life.
From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, our
picturesque clubhouse
,
spacious banquet room
, and
breezy outdoor terrace
provide the ideal setting. Overlooking lush greens and sparkling water features, your event will have the serene ambiance only a golf club can offer.
Let your guests mix and mingle beneath vaulted ceilings, toast under twinkling lights, or take in the Florida sunshine during golden hour. Every corner of Eagle Creek offers a photo-worthy backdrop that adds magic to your memories.
Personalized Touches & Exceptional Service
We know how important these moments are, and we’re here to make them effortless for you. Our dedicated events team works with you to customize every detail—from décor and layout to curated menus and timelines—so your day is as unique as your story.
Culinary Delights
Let’s be honest—no celebration is complete without great food. Our culinary team offers a range of menu options that can be tailored to your taste, style, and dietary needs. From elegant hors d’oeuvres and custom dessert stations to full buffet spreads and signature cocktails, we’ll help create a menu that’s just as memorable as the occasion itself.
Celebrate With Ease
Beautiful indoor & outdoor spaces
Flexible packages & custom layouts
On-site catering with customizable menus
Ample parking & accessible location in Lake Nona
Experienced staff to support your event from start to finish
All-Inclusive Packages for Effortless Planning
We understand that planning an event can be overwhelming, which is why our dedicated team is here to make the process seamless and enjoyable. Our comprehensive event packages include:
Venue Rental
: Access to our elegant indoor ballroom or scenic outdoor lawn
Event Coordination
: A professional event planner to assist with every detail
Catering Services
: Customizable menus crafted by our award-winning chef, featuring a range of delectable options to suit your taste
Beverage Packages
: A selection of beverage options
Décor and Setup
: Tables, chairs, linens, and setup/cleanup services to ensure a stress-free experience
Additional Amenities
: Complimentary cake cutting, 3-tiered centerpiece of hurricane vases with water and floating candles, and access to our bridal party locker room
Let’s Plan Something Beautiful
Life is worth celebrating—and at Eagle Creek Golf Club, we make it unforgettable.
Reach out to us today to schedule a tour or speak with our Events Manager, Nicole. Let’s start planning a day filled with laughter, love, and lasting memories.
To inquire about hosting your event with us, please contact us at
407-273-4653 ext. 4692
or at
nbeland@eaglecreekorlando.com
For More Information
